name: Perfect Match Case
description: Resume that perfectly matches job requirements

input.resume_text:
Alex Johnson
Senior DevOps Engineer

Experience:
Senior DevOps Engineer at CloudTech (2020-2024)
- Architected and maintained AWS infrastructure for 50+ microservices
- Implemented Kubernetes clusters managing 200+ containers
- Built CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitLab CI, and GitHub Actions
- Automated infrastructure deployment with Terraform and CloudFormation
- Led migration from monolithic to microservices architecture
- Managed production incidents and implemented monitoring solutions

DevOps Engineer at DataCorp (2018-2020)
- Developed Python automation scripts for infrastructure management
- Implemented Docker containerization for legacy applications
- Set up monitoring and alerting with Prometheus and Grafana
- Managed PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases in production

Education:
Bachelor's in Computer Science (2018)
AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional

Skills:
AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Jenkins, Python, Bash, Linux, Git, Microservices, CI/CD, Prometheus, Grafana, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, CloudFormation, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions
input.job_ad:
Senior DevOps Engineer

We are seeking an experienced Senior DevOps Engineer to lead our infrastructure initiatives.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience
- Strong AWS cloud platform expertise
- Kubernetes and Docker containerization experience
- Infrastructure as Code (Terraform or CloudFormation)
- CI/CD pipeline development (Jenkins, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions)
- Python or Bash scripting skills
- Linux system administration
- Git version control
- Microservices architecture experience
- Database management (PostgreSQL or MongoDB)
- Monitoring and alerting systems
- Production incident management

Preferred:
- AWS certifications
- Experience with 50+ microservices
- Migration from monolithic to microservices

suggested_experiences.implementation: Take on additional microservices migration initiatives
Establish knowledge sharing sessions and best practices documentation
